author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 20-year-old construction worker was arrested for allegedly murdering his brother. Sirumugai Police said that both of them were in an inebriated condition when they picked up a quarrel over riding their father’s motorcycle.

According to the police, on Monday night the accused S. Aravinth (20) hit his brother S. Bharathiraja (17) of Vayalipalayam in Iluppanatham village with a cricket bat during a drunken brawl. Bharathiraja also attacked his brother with an iron pipe.

Bharathiraja was admitted to Coimbatore Medical College Hospital with injuries on his head, forehead and face.Meanwhile, the police registered a case under section 307 (attempt to murder) of the Indian Penal Code based on a complaint lodge by their aunt A. Vennila. Police arrested Aravinth and lodged him in the Borstal at Pollachi for under trials and convicts aged 18 to 21 years. On Tuesday Bharathiraja died and the case was altered to 302 (murder) of the Indian Penal Code.

House burgled

Unidentified burglars broke into a house at Perur Chettipalayam on Monday when the inmates were away to Dindigul and decamped with 13 sovereigns jewellery.
title: Youth arrested for murdering brother
